QuestionStem: One of the cities Dr. Shepherd has studied is Houston, Texas. He found that it rains more in Houston than in surrounding areas. What do you think will happen to rainfall amounts if Houston grows larger?

options.AnswerText: A. Rainfall amounts will decrease in the city.
options.Feedback: Think about how the features of cities have been found to influence rainfall amounts. How would you expect an increase in those features to affect rainfall amounts?

options.AnswerText: B. Rainfall amounts will increase in the city.
C. Rainfall amounts will be the same in the city.
options.Feedback: Think about how the features of cities have been found to influence rainfall amounts. How would you expect an increase in those features to affect rainfall amounts?

FinalIncorrectFeedback: If Houston grows larger, there will be more buildings and artificial materials, increasing rainfall.
